response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation, offering unparalleled benefits and experiences. Given its significance, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $850,000. I believe this is a fair and generous offer considering the exceptional quality and rarity of the product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both our interests.", "product_price": 850000}
